description: Stream Guide for Twitch can check the top games being streamed on Twitch.tv and how many viewers are currently watching. You can also ask for the top channels (i.e. streamers) for a specific game.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Stream Guide what are the top games
Alexa, ask Stream Guide who's streaming Hearthstone
name: Stream Guide for Twitch
shortDescription: This skill can find the top games and channels being streamed on Twitch.tv
